verses.roman:
prasāda āni' tāṅre karāha āge bhikṣā
paścāt āsi' āmāre karāiha śikṣā

synonyms: prasāda āni'-bringing jagannātha-prasāda; tāṅre—unto Him; karāha—make; āge—first; bhikṣā—acceptance; paścāt—afterwards; āsi'-coming here; āmāre—unto me; karāiha—cause; śikṣā—teaching.
translation: "Take jagannātha-prasāda and first give it to Caitanya Mahāprabhu and His associates. After that, come back here and teach me well."
